learning.supervised.methods

Class RSLVQ

  • java.lang.Object
    • learning.supervised.Classifier
      • learning.supervised.methods.RSLVQ
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Citable, java.io.Serializable, ValidateableInterface

    public class RSLVQ
extends Classifier
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class implements the robust soft learning vector quantization classification method.
